title: Week #28 $ROCKSTAR of EPNS - Nominations
body:
**Background**:

The EPNS ROCKSTAR NFTs are gifted every week to a community member who has been a particular fan, supporter, and evangelist of the EPNS protocol. The collection is a series of limited NFTs by commissioned Indian artists to support our amazing community! 

**Motivation:**

The EPNS Rockstar campaign started as a way to give back to the most supportive and active members of the community, who consistently contribute value to the EPNS ecosystem. Along with the NFT, each recipient also receives **2400 $PUSH** tokens. 

The PUSH Team Champions will nominate **4 ROCKSTAR candidates** from the past submissions, and the $PUSH community will vote for their top choice from the nominations.

This proposal aims to elect Week #28 [EPNS $ROCKSTAR ❤️ NFT Contest](https://medium.com/ethereum-push-notification-service/kicking-off-the-epns-nft-community-drops-6a5c49808cf) Winner through governance voting.

Nominated contestants are:

- [**@99promitsaha**](https://twitter.com/99promitsaha)
- **[@Mallucryptologi](https://twitter.com/Mallucryptologi)**
- **[@Wolftrade_](https://twitter.com/Wolftrade_)**
- **[@curious_cuber](https://twitter.com/curious_cuber)**


Review their contributions to the EPNS Community & Ecosystem [HERE](https://gov.epns.io/t/epns-rockstar-proposal-nominations/237/5) and vote for your favorite contestant.  

**For/Against:** NA

---
**Haven't gotten or delegated voting power?**
1. Go to [https://incentives.epns.io/](https://incentives.epns.io/)
2. Under the PUSH Governance section, select the PUSH Nominee that you want to delegate to or delegate the power to yourself.
3. You are ready to vote!

Let's keep $PUSHing!
author: 0x1c8c125C1Eac1C8d450979cbf0146985D75df55A
